Title
NSString * title
 The title string. Default is nil.
CPTextStyle * titleTextStyle
 The text style of the title.
CGPoint titleDisplacement
 A vector giving the displacement of the title from the edge location.
CPRectAnchor titlePlotAreaFrameAnchor
 The location of the title with respect to the plot area frame. Default is top center.
